DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study describe service member ' experience participant health research , include reason decide research participation .
DOC.brief_title: Health Research Participation : Experiences Decisions Military Members
DOC.detailed_description: Recent study war injury include research participant US military service member return war Iraq Afghanistan . Despite increased demand military relevant research , little known recent experience service member research participant research participation decision . The study aim : 1 ) . Describe experience military service member participate health research ; 2 ) . Explore reason military service member decide participation health research ; 3 ) . Identify effective strategy promote military service member ' participation research . Demographic data collect 50 service member participate health research previously decline research participation . Up 40 service member participate individual , in-depth , semi-structured interview person via telephone .
DOC.criteria: current US military member branch service time screen experience research participant and/or previously decline participation least one health research study within past three year age 1880 year willing participate study willing interview consent participate people meet inclusion criterion unable verbally communicate English
